overview: GHERMANYA is about Germany in Ghana. It shows various German influences: Traces of colonial past and christianization. Voluntary fire brigade from Buxtehude. Challenges in learning German. Schwarzw√§lder Schinken. An independent Volta Region that wants the Germans to rule again? Goethe Institut. A footballer whose visa applications got denied several times, but who is also a shopkeeper and sells German beer. Lidl. People who want to go to Germany and people who were in Germany before. Zickenflitzer. Traders and citizens who love Germany because of the fish there.
title: Ghermanya: Germany in Ghana
